title: antsIntermodalityIntrasubject.sh
description: Performs registration between a scalar image and a T1 image.

dimension.title: Image dimension
dimension.description: Dimensionality of the image, typically 3 for 3D images.

anatomical_t1_image.title: Anatomical T1 image
anatomical_t1_image.description: Anatomical T1 image (brain or whole-head) to align to.

anatomical_reference_image.title: Anatomical reference image
anatomical_reference_image.description: Anatomical reference image to warp to, often higher resolution than the anatomical T1 image.

scalar_image_to_match.title: Scalar image to match
scalar_image_to_match.description: Scalar image to be matched, such as average BOLD, average DWI, etc.

anatomical_t1brainmask.title: Anatomical T1 brainmask
anatomical_t1brainmask.description: Brain mask for the anatomical T1 image, should mask out regions not appearing in the scalar image.

t1_to_template_prefix.title: Prefix of T1 to template transform
t1_to_template_prefix.description: Prefix for T1 to template transform files.

auxiliary_scalar_images.title: Auxiliary scalar images
auxiliary_scalar_images.description: Auxiliary scalar images to warp to the template.

auxiliary_dt_image.title: Auxiliary DT image
auxiliary_dt_image.description: Auxiliary DT image to warp to the template.
